1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: During a raging storm, a "dreadful visitor" preys upon a helpless Flora Bannerworth.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Upon hearing cries of distress, Mr. Marchdale and Henry and Mrs. Bannerworth run to the aid of Flora.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Marchdale and Henry chase after the intruder.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: In the aftermath of chasing Flora's attacker, Henry and Mr. Marchdale return to Flora's bedside to determine what damage has been done.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Henry guards Flora as dawn approaches and gets the eerie feeling the imposing portrait over the bed is the dreadful visitor from earlier that evening.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Henry and Marchdale confront the unthinkable conclusion that the intruder was a vampire.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Dr, Chillingworth visits the ailing Flora and contests her belief in vampires.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Henry reads up on vampire lure and the Bannerworths receive an invitation from their new neighbor.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Marchdale reveals part of the garment torn from the intruder.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Henry and Marchdale compare a piece of garment, torn from the intruder, to the portrait in Flora's old bedchamber.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Henry, Marchdale and Chillingworth search about the grounds of Bannerworth Hall during the full moon, looking for any unusual activity.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Henry, Marchdale and Chillingworth recount the night's events and Marchdale offers a proposal to ease Henry's mind.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: Flora stirs with troubled dreams and recounts her time with Henry in the Italian Alps.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: Henry decides to visit the tomb of his ancestor and prepares Flora for the evening to come.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: Henry visits the tomb of his ancestor and the vampire reappears.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

16.plot: Henry, Marchdale and Chillingworth race back to Bannerworth Hall to discover Charles Holland has arrived.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: Henry receives a new letter from his mysterious neighbor. The servants are leaving in droves after the rumors surrounding the family spread through the village.

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: Henry and Marchdale pay a visit to their neighbor only to make a terrifying discovery.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

19.plot: Henry plots revenge in a fit of anger while Marchdale desperately attempts to calm him down.

20.title: Episode #1.20

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

20.plot: Admiral Bell and Jack Pringle arrive at the Nelson Arms Inn to confront a lawyer who has warned him about his nephew, Charles Holland.

21.title: Episode #1.21

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

21.plot: Varney meets Flora after coming onto the Bannerworth Estate.

22.title: Episode #1.22

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

22.plot: Admiral Bell arrives at Bannerworth Hall to confront Charles Holland.

23.title: Episode #1.23

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

23.plot: Sir Francis Varney pays a visit to Flora.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

24.plot: The family runs to meet Flora after hearing a cry for help.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

25.plot: Admiral Bell agrees to deliver a challenge to Sir Francis Varney.

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

26.plot: Admiral Bell and Jack Pringle pay a visit to Sir Francis Varney.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

27.plot: Admiral Bell notifies Charles that there has been a change of plan and Charles receives a challenge of his own.

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

28.plot: Season Finale--Charles sneaks out in the middle of the night and leaves behind three mysterious letters.

29.title: The "Lost" Episode

episode of.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (TV Series 2016– )

29.plot: Henry, Charles and Marchdale confront Varney about the portrait in the bedchamber.

imdb.plot outline: Varney the Vampire follows the Bannerworths, a formerly wealthy family driven to ruin by their recently deceased father. When Sir Francis Varney enters their lives, the family (Mrs. Bannerworth and her adult children Henry and Flora) fight as they try to prove to their peers and to themselves that Varney is the vampiric ancestor of the Bannerworths preying on their vulnerability.
imdb.title: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood
akas: Varney the Vampire or the Feast of Blood (United States)
plot: Varney the Vampire follows the exploits of Sir Francis Varney, a vampire that infiltrates the Bannerworth family in attempt to reestablish his own aristocracy.::Anonymous

Varney the Vampire follows the Bannerworths, a formerly wealthy family driven to ruin by their recently deceased father. When Sir Francis Varney enters their lives, the family (Mrs. Bannerworth and her adult children Henry and Flora) fight as they try to prove to their peers and to themselves that Varney is the vampiric ancestor of the Bannerworths preying on their vulnerability.::Demented Features
